rewrite_q: i asked benjamin moore my previous question about cobblestone path . first of all, i want to say again how much i love your design of this gorgeous kitchen! i reached out to benjamin moore to ask about cobblestone path 1606 being a gray color and not light blue as pictured here and thought i would share their reply and recommendations to anyone interested. andquot.thanks for reaching out! cobblestone path 1606 is more of a gray than blue. we can’t say for sure why it looks so blue in the image from the designer. it could be the lighting because the kitchen is flooded with natural light but because it is not our image we can’t say for certain. some other colors to consider that are similar to the island color are beacon gray 2128.60 and mt rainier gray 2127.60. if you find those options are still casting too gray in the lighting in your kitchen, consider options with a little more blue in them such as serenata af.535 and soft sky 807. be sure to try a few of these options out with a sample to see how they work with the lighting in your space. best of luck!andquot. hopefully, this information will help anyone who is looking for a light blue paint color for their island.
new_q: some other colors to consider that are similar to the island color are beacon gray 2128.60 and mt rainier gray 2127.60. if you find those options are still casting too gray in the lighting in your kitchen, consider options with a little more blue in them such as serenata af.535 and soft sky 807. be sure to try a few of these options out with a sample to see how they work with the lighting in your space.
